mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(username, password, user_email, user_phone_number, user_address, user_pic_url, nickName, user_division, created_at) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userAddress}, #{userPicUrl}, #{nickName}, #{userDivision}, now());
mapper.select: select * from user_tb u join team_tb t on u.team_id = t.id join region_tb r on t.region_id = r.id join sport_tb s on t.sport_id = s.id where u.id = #{id}
